original_text: And when they were come up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip, that the eunuch saw him no more: and he went on his way rejoicing.
korean_text: 둘이 물에서 올라올새 주의 영이 빌립을 이끌어간지라 내시는 기쁘게 길을 가므로 그를 다시 보지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: And when they were come up
the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip
that the eunuch saw him no more
sentences.korean_translation: 내시가 더 이상 그를 보지 못했고

sentences.original_text: and he went on his way rejoicing
